name: Grant Leighton
coverLetter: Three years experience with small home grow maintenance and care during grow big fan ,trimming ,harvest ,wet trim, dry trim and proper curing of finished product are some of my skills along with a passion for cannabis I have a positive attitude good work ethic and the ability to follow directions and a willingness to learn and develop more skills  I have reliable transportation clean driving records and can pass background checks I am looking to get into the cannabis industry full time.
